title: The Full Stop Cafe
description: A vegetarian restaurant serving simple home-cooked style food served all day. Soups, sandwiches & things on toast are on the menu, as well as freshly made-in-house cakes and fair trade coffee. Vegans please inquire. Children's menu available. Situated within a large second hand bookshop. Gluten Free options. Wi-Fi.
streetAddress: Unit 1 Hallatrow Business Park, Wells Road, Bath & North East Somerset
